title: Zac chroma problem
body:
heey is this only me having the problem if i pick my chroma pack collor in skin slelection ust before the game  it tells me that there has been a problem picking the skin 
i bought al the collors and i would love to use them but instead i cant

replies.body: I've seen a few reports about some players failing to select their skin, but I don't really know too much else right now.  Is this still an issue?  If so, try enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode to see if that could be the culprit.  Test it in a custom game though to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if that helps.
